item.title: Google Ad Grants
item.description:
Google Ad Grants

 Reach and engage your supporters through online advertising with AdWords.

 Promote your organisation’s website on Google Raise awareness by choosing relevant keywords and creating unique ads to highlight your work

item.title: Get in touch
item.description:
Get in touch

Digital Agency specialises in helping nonprofits achieve their missions by helping them make better decisions on their digital spend by better measuring their digital effectiveness with Google Analytics and can help transform your nonprofit's digital reach with US$10000 per month worth of in-kind Google Search Ads via Google Ad Grants.

item.title: Google for Non-Profits Getting Started Guide
item.description:
Google for Non-Profits Getting Started Guide

If you're ready to get going with a specific Google product, you've come to the right place. Check out our step-by-step getting started guides to help you get up and running successfully.

item.title: Programme Benefits
item.description:
Programme Benefits 

The Google for Non-profits Programme offers qualified organisations access to free versions of paid Google products and special features designed for non-profits. 

These tools can help non-profits find new donors and volunteers, work more efficiently and get supporters to take action.

item.title: Eligibility guidelines
item.description:
Eligibility guidelines

Organisations that meet the following criteria are eligible to participate in the Google for Non-Profits programme

item.title: Google for Non-Profits Case Studies
item.description:
Google for Non-Profits Case Studies

Organisations like yours are using Google for Non-Profits in exciting, unexpected and effective ways. See how these non-profits are increasing their reach and impact every day.

item.title: Nonprofit Success Stories | Google Ad Grants - Google
item.description:
Nonprofit Success Stories | Google Ad Grants - Google

Check out some of the success stories from other nonprofit organizations that have benefited from Google Ad Grants. Let us help you share your story.
